reviewText: Still waiting to get this dvd. Can't wait get it!
Very honest and directly to the point. No question was dodged.
Got this for my mom for xmas. She is a huge Gotti fan. She owns everything Gotti. So i know she is going to love this and she has not watched this dvd, Thank you so much

THE BLACK HAND,LA COSA NOSTRA,THE COMMISSION,THE MAFIA.  WHAT EVER NAME YOU CHOOSE TO CALL IT. THERE IS NO DOUBT, THAT THE MAFIA LEFT THEYRE MARK IN THE ANNAL"S OF AMERICAN HISTORY, AND THE WORLD.  THIS DVD GET"S DOWN TO THE ROOTS OF THE MAFIA.  INFORMATIVE, DETAILED, AND FACTUAL. EVEN THOUGH THIS DVD CENTERS ON JOHN GOTTI AND THE GOTTI FAMILY, YOU WILL FIND THAT IT COVERS ALOT MORE, AND GIVES YOU INSIGHT OF WHAT ITS LIKE TO BE A PART OF THE FAMILY. YOU WILL FIND OUT THAT JOHN GOTTI WAS NOT ONE OF THE OLD STYLE MAFIOSI, HE HAD HIS OWN RULES AND DID THINGS HIS WAY. IN FACT HE BROKE MOST OF THE RULES THAT THE OLD MOBSTERS LIVED BY. FROM A STREET THUG AND SOLDIER ALL THE WAY TO BEING THE BOSS ( THE TEFLON DON). NO MATTER IF YOU AGREE WITH HIS METHODS OF KILLING HIS WAY TO THE TOP, OR BREAKING THE RULES OF TRADITIONAL MAFIA . HIS UNORTHODOX WAYS LEAD HIM TO THE TOP, WHICH DEMANDED RESPECT, LOYALTY,AND DEVOTION FROM THE PEOPLE THAT WORKED FOR HIM, AND EVEN FROM THE PUBLIC.  I TRULY ENJOYED THIS DVD, AND I THINK YOU WILL TOO. KUDOS TO 60 MINUTES AND JOHN GOTTI JR FOR GETTING TOGETHER TO BRING THIS OUT IN THE OPEN ,AND SHARING WHAT ITS LIKE TO BE PART OF THE MAFIA. THIS DVD IS TRULY WORTH EVERY PENNY THAT I PAID. AND I THINK YOU WILL FEEL THE SAME. I WISH THE VERY BEST TO JOHN GOTTI.JR AND THE GOTTI FAMILY. BUONA FORTUNA. AND A SPECIAL THANKS TO 60 MINUTES.
